nodes.text: A humanoid assistant worked with the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk and a team of several other hunters, in an unsuccessful bid to steal the carbonite-frozen Han Solo from the bounty hunter Boba Fett in 3.5 ABY. Fett turned the tables on Bossk after killing many of the hunters and sending their corpses in a shuttle to Bossk's ship. The assistant, believing the shuttle to contain Solo's frozen body, was killed when the shuttle exploded upon reaching Bossk's ship, foiling the Trandoshan's plans.
